wrongPowder.util.string
Class StringAnalyze

java.lang.Object
  wrongPowder.util.string.StringAnalyze

public class StringAnalyze
extends java.lang.Object

TextAnalyse class will help you analyze text input. It return totalWords, totalChars, smallestWord, largestWord etc.
